_xResult.title: The Kat Skirt
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made tea length skirt with breezy pleats
_xResult.longdesc:
A sheet of breeze, thin like silk, washes over and past your sun kissed cheek. A parasail makes its way leisurely across the sky. A faithful pup meets its owner at the door on the front porch. Cherish small moments like these in a skirt made for the little things.

This custom made piece is a breezy full circle skirt, tea length and made from 100% cotton lawn.

If you've never experienced having a skirt made custom to your measurements, you'll love the feeling of knowing it's made just for you and fits you perfectly! For custom made requests regarding sizing, let Tammi Anne know your desired measurements using the button below.
